history.proof: intros p a b. induction p as [| t q IH]. - simpl. qsimpl time: 1 use: plusP_com. - simpl. qsimpl time: 1 use: plusP_com,eqp_pluspf_com_r.

ctx: induction p as [| t q IH].

ctx: induction p as [| t q IH].

ctx: induction p as [| t q IH].
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) t : Term A n q : list (Term A n) a, b : Term A n IH : eqP A eqA n (mults (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) q) (mults (multTerm multA (n:=n) b a) q) Unable to unify "eqP ?M1857 ?M1860 ?M1868 (pluspf ?M1858 ?M1861 ?M1867 ?M1870 ?M1874 ?M1872) (pluspf ?M1858 ?M1861 ?M1867 ?M1870 ?M1874 ?M1873)" with "eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) t) (mults (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) q)) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) b a) t) (mults (multTerm multA (n:=n) b a) q))".

ctx: induction p as [| t q IH].

original: intros p a b. induction p as [| t q IH]. - simpl. apply plusP_com. auto. auto. - simpl. apply eqp_pluspf_com_r. apply plusP_com. + auto. + auto. + apply IH.
